data.message: There ain't but one GOD,IT'S DEFINITELY NOT YOU,NOR WILL YOU EVER BE.

replies.message: Have you ever heard of Greek mythology? And he said I'm beginning to FEEL like a rap god.. Cool your jets.. If you don't like em don't like his page simple as that..
God killed 133 thousand people in the bible. Satan killed 11 because God made him. Therefore your whole religion and rules are a sham. Kindly off in the direction id like you to fuck.
Ppl like you make the world a bitchy miserable place with your stupid comments. Surprised your mouthy ass didn't get roasted on here yet.
GUYS DONT GET MAD AT HER-- you should feel sorry for her. Cause I dont know who she is but i will find her and send her to Liam Neelson
She's right there is only one god it isn't a fault or shame to be a Moslem guy she can say what she wants to say right Kay?
RAP GOD meaning the God of rap. Nothing else u cunt
Great response lady. Hate on Eminem for something he didn't say, get replies, then silence. Yup sounds like female logic, bet she is Kim's friend.
Totally agree with you Kay and the Blood of Jesus is against Satan and those who follow you
